title: Harvesting Sweet Potatoes at Don's Produce

tasks.task: Planting sweet potatoes and preparing them for irrigation.
subtasks: Ensuring proper timing for planting to avoid dry conditions.
Cultivating the soil to remove weeds and manage runners.

tasks.task: Harvesting sweet potatoes using a hydraulic harvester.
subtasks: Operating the hydraulic harvester to dig the sweet potatoes.
Checking harvested sweet potatoes for quality.
Transferring washed sweet potatoes to a storage trailer.
